thread.title: BRIEF-Saudi's Al Hammadi Signs MOU With Sudair Pharma For Acquisition Of Equity Stake

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Saudi's Al Hammadi Signs MOU With Sudair Pharma For Acquisition Of Equity Stake

organizations.name: al hammadi signs mou with sudair pharma for acquisition of equity

text:
April 22 (Reuters) - AL HAMMADI COMPANY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND INVESTMENT:
* SIGNS MOU WITH SUDAIR PHARMA COMPANY FOR ACQUISITION OF EQUITY STAKE
* TERM OF MOU IS TWO MONTHS FROM DATE OF SIGNING MOU APRIL 21, 2018 AND WILL END ON JUNE 20, 2018
* THE ACQUISITION IS IN LINE WITH AL HAMMADIâ€™S GROWTH PLANS AND THE KINGDOM VISION 2030 TO NATIONALIZE ADVANCED INDUSTRIES AND TECHNOLOGIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
